events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me well and I no longer need it.
The request has been categorized under refund due to customer's mention of wanting money back for their purchase.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase to provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging for us to proceed?
My order number is 789654123. The jacket has never been worn and is still in its original packaging with tags attached.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate the refund process once the jacket is returned to us. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your prompt reply and for sending the shipping label, I appreciate it. I will send back the jacket today.
We’ve received your returned jacket and processed your full refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund for your jacket purchase. Please let us know if everything is okay.
Since the refund was processed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support.
